name: Tumblin' Dice "Casino" Single Barrel
description: Someone Say Whiskey is proud to present “Casino”, a 4+ year Tumblin’ Dice Bourbon. This was the first private barrel selection done in Texas for this up and coming brand.

name: NULU Straight Bourbon
description: Someone Say Whiskey is proud to present Nulu, a 6 yr 2 mo Straight Bourbon. This is the first private barrel selection sold through a retailer in Texas!
tastingNotes: Classic MGP with hints of cinnamon, chocolate, and tobacco. Rye spices show up heavily in the finish.

name: Litchfield "The Batcher" Straight Bourbon
description: Someone Say Whiskey is proud to present The Batcher - Litchfield 4 yr Straight Bourbon at cask strength. This is Series I of our vertical series with Litchfield. We will release a progressively older (by 1 yr) barrel every year for the next 8 when we are at 12 yr!

name: Unallocated Batch 1
description: Unallocated is a private label 6+yr MGP blend of 3 single barrels carefully selected by the admins of SSW then additionally aged in Texas, blended and bottled at Ironroot.
